body:
On the cross-platform aspect, to add to Mostapha's release notes, the [core library](https://github.com/ladybug-tools/honeybee) has been tested on the following platforms:

Linux Ubuntu: Version 14.04 | 16.04 | 17.04

Linux RHEL: 6.8

Unix FreeBSD: 10.0

Linux (Cloud VM):  [Microsoft Azure H16mr](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/windows/sizes-hpc) running Ubuntu 17.04

Linux (Cloud VM): [Amazon AWS EC2 t2](https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types/) running Ubuntu 14.04

The core dependencies for running Honeybee on the cloud are Python 2.7, Radiance, git and honeybee . Since Apple computers typically run Unix-like OSs, we don't foresee any portability issues with them.
